definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 8:8 stylus (√ dub,; Kö:ii. 1:83 (after older authorities) cp. Ar. gwt., ga0t.a sink, penerate);—´[[ע]] only cstr.:
of iron, for use on stone or metal Je 17:1 ([[בְּחִפּׂרֶן שָׁמִיר]] with diamond-point), Job 19:24 (v. also [[חֶרֶט]]).
prob. = reed-pen (used o roll, cf. Je 36:2, Je 36:23 etc.), [[שֶׁקֶר סׂפְרִים]] ´[[ע]] Je 8:8, fig., [[סוֹפֵר מָהִיר]] ´[[לְשׁוֹנִי ע]] Ps 45:1 (cf. Now Arch. i. 290 Benz:Arch. 290).
